name: Miles Caton
description: '''Miles Caton''' (born March 3, 2005) is an American musician and actor. He gained recognition for his role as Sammie in [[Ryan Coogler]]'s horror film ''[[Sinners (2025 film)|Sinners]]'' (2025), for which he received various accolades, including the [[Critics' Choice Movie Award for Best Young Performer]] and nominations for two [[Actor Awards]] and the [[BAFTA Rising Star Award]].
